name: Shannon Smith
what_you_do: Shannon offers wellness coaching, energy healing, regression hypnosis, sound healing, and speaking services.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking to improve their health, wellness, and life alignment.
social_proof: Shannon has helped clients with nutrition, stress management, weight management, lifestyle changes, managing medical diagnosis, and holistic living.
signature_programs: Quantum Healing Hypnosis Technique (QHHT®) individual sessions, group regression sessions, and a premium product line called 'Your Wellness Sanctuary'.
business_focus: Helping individuals improve their health, wellness, and life alignment through various holistic services.
service_provided: wellness coaching, energy healing, regression hypnosis, sound healing, speaking
